title: Form of adjusters' license
context: ยง431:9-225 Form of adjusters&rsquo; license. Adjusters&rsquo; licenses shall be in such form as the commissioner prescribes. The licenses shall contain: (1) The name of the adjuster, and the address of the adjuster&rsquo;s place of business; (2) A statement as to whether the adjuster is so licensed as an independent adjuster or as a public adjuster; (3) Date of issuance of the license; and (4) Other statements proper to the purposes of the license. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
